masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "We've got a break-in at First National Bank—security footage shows a panda in a cowboy hat monologuing to the cameras about 'the city that never sleeps and the dame who never calls.' He's been at it for twenty minutes. The vault's wide open."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Track the getaway vehicle (witnesses report a semi truck)
  • Identify the bear gang's next target
  • Do not engage directly—these bears are more dangerous than they look

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "Someone's been ordering 47 bamboo containers a day to the same address for two weeks. Paid in cash. Left a cowboy hat as a tip once. We think it's connected to those bear crimes?"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Stake out the delivery address
  • Trace Greg's PI office location
  • Gather evidence without alerting the target

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "Look, I shouldn't be calling, but there's a panda running down 5th Avenue being chased by guys in suits. He keeps yelling about 'the debt that follows a man like his shadow.' The mob wants their money. Maybe you heroes care?"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Intercept the mob enforcers before they catch Greg
  • Get Greg to safety—he might have valuable intel
  • Decide if you want Greg to testify or let him go

name: The Dame Who Done Him Wrong

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "We've got a panda in our lobby demanding to see our files on the 'Honeycomb Diamond Heist.' Says he's a private investigator. He's eating our decorative bamboo plant and muttering about 'the case that started it all.'"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Determine if Greg is an ally or obstacle in this case
  • Find out what the Honeycomb Diamond has to do with the bears
  • Get the information before Greg does—or work together

name: Cowboy Hat at the Crime Scene

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "Jewelry store got hit during the Christmas rush. Only clue is a cowboy hat with bamboo residue and a note that says 'The city giveth, and the city taketh away.' Pretty sure that's not how the saying goes."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Analyze the cowboy hat for clues
  • Track Greg's movements through the mall
  • Find the stolen jewelry before it's fenced

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "We've got a situation at City Credit Union. Panda has hostages, but he keeps... pausing dramatically? Every time he monologues about 'the long dark night of the soul,' there's like a 30-second window. Can you work with that?"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Time your entry during Greg's dramatic pauses
  • Rescue hostages without triggering his fight response
  • Consider: is Greg even aware he took hostages?

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "There's a grizzly bear in a purple crown taking all our cold medicine and children's vitamins. She keeps asking if we've had breakfast and whether we're getting enough sleep. I'm honestly more concerned than scared?"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Stop Petunia from stealing medicine
  • Figure out who 'the kids' are—bear cubs? Human kids?
  • Handle this gently—she seems to genuinely care

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "A grizzly bear just robbed our donation box, but then she started serving soup to the homeless? She's calling everyone 'sweetie' and making sure they finish their vegetables. She also took $400. I don't know how to feel about this."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Recover the stolen funds
  • Don't cause a scene—the homeless patrons are actually eating
  • Understand Petunia's moral compass—can she be reasoned with?

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "Code purple! A real grizzly bear is trying to steal our Build-A-Bear Body Championship trophy from the display case. She keeps saying 'This was MINE in '09' and 'They rigged the competition!' The children are... honestly kind of delighted."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Stop Petunia from stealing the trophy
  • Investigate her claim—was she actually robbed of victory?
  • Keep the kids safe while they cheer for the bear

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "I saw the bear heist last week and now there's a grizzly at my door. She's not threatening me exactly, she just keeps saying 'I'm not angry, I'm just disappointed' and asking if my mother knows I'm a snitch. I'M FORTY-THREE."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Protect the witness from Petunia's intimidation tactics
  • Get Petunia to back off—violence may escalate things
  • Deal with the psychological damage of mom-guilt from a bear

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "A bear in a purple crown took our bake sale proceeds—$847! But she left business cards for a 'Bear Parenting Support Group' and told Mrs. Henderson that her snickerdoodles needed more cinnamon. She's not wrong about the cookies but STILL."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Recover the bake sale funds
  • Track Petunia to her parenting support group—is it real?
  • Maybe get the cookie recipe critique—for science

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "There's a grizzly with a shopping cart FULL of honey jars in aisle 7. She's been staring at the self-checkout for ten minutes like she's having a moral crisis. I think she's trying to decide whether to pay or run. Please hurry."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Intercept Petunia before she makes her choice
  • If she runs, pursue without endangering shoppers
  • If she pays... do you still arrest her for other crimes?

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "The Vanderbilt Diamond is being stolen AS WE SPEAK! The thief came through the skylight—some kind of five-limbed creature in a glitter crown? There's a TRAIL OF GLITTER and it smells like... artificial sweetener? She's doing FLIPS."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Stop Barbara before she escapes the museum
  • Follow the glitter trail—she's leaving evidence everywhere
  • Match her acrobatic abilities or find another way

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "A bearcat broke into our prop room during intermission. She's taken the crown jewels from Act 3, but instead of leaving she's... performing? She's on stage doing a trapeze act with the chandelier. The audience thinks it's part of the show!"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Wait for Barbara's inevitable bow—that's your window
  • Capture her without ruining the audience's experience
  • Recover the stolen props before Act 3

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "We've got a lead on the bearcat thief. Witnesses keep mentioning a 'weirdly pleasant smell' at every crime scene—like cotton candy mixed with fruit. The scent trail leads into the ventilation system. Anyone good at crawling through ducts?"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Follow Barbara's sweet scent through the city vents
  • Map out her travel routes for future stakeouts
  • Don't get ambushed in the tight spaces

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "Our former star Barbara the Bearcat just showed up to confront Mandy, the monkey who replaced her. They're circling each other on the high wire. Barbara keeps yelling about 'stealing her spotlight.' Can someone de-escalate before we have an animal fight 40 feet up?"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Calm Barbara down before the confrontation turns violent
  • Understand her grievances—was she treated unfairly?
  • Maybe find a compromise? Co-headliners?

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "The glitter bearcat is using our Ferris wheel as an escape route! She's swinging from cart to cart like it's a circus act—because apparently IT WAS. She's heading for the roller coaster rails. This is the weirdest chase I've ever radioed in."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Pursue Barbara through the carnival rides
  • Don't let her reach the exit—or the rooftops
  • Keep carnival guests safe during the aerial chase

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "There's something in our facility—looks like a tiny bear? It's got a flat cap and an ENORMOUS canteen. It's trying to fill up from our main tank while muttering about dehydration. It seems scared. Also it might be a tardigrade?"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Stop Puddles from contaminating the water supply
  • He seems panicked—approach carefully
  • Find out why he needs so much water

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "I'm calling about... a research subject. Designation 1A. It's a mutant tardigrade, highly resilient. It was spotted near GenTech Labs—the facility where it was created. I need it recovered. Discretely. It knows things."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Find out what Puddles is looking for at the lab
  • Decide: help Puddles or return him to Dr. Cross?
  • What secrets is GenTech hiding?

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "Someone's been stealing our honey reserves, but the weird part? A swarm of bees seems to be HELPING the thief—a small creature in a flat cap. The bees call themselves 'The Beeves'? Our bees are unionized now? Please help."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Intercept the honey-water heist in progress
  • Understand the Puddles-Beeves alliance
  • Can you negotiate with sentient bees?

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "There's a tiny bear-thing living in the Memorial Fountain. It's been there three days. Every time we try to drain it, it cries. Actually cries. We think it needs the water to survive? But also it's technically trespassing. Help?"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Coax Puddles out of the fountain safely
  • Don't dehydrate him—find an alternative water source
  • Maybe negotiate a better living situation?

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "We've got a warehouse fire, but there's a tardigrade in a flat cap spraying water everywhere—from an industrial canteen? He's actually HELPING put out the fire while also definitely stealing the water from our trucks. Do we arrest him or give him a medal?"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Help contain the fire—Puddles is doing his best
  • Decide what to do about Puddles after the crisis
  • Maybe recruit him for the fire department?

name: Ten and Two on the Highway

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "We're in pursuit of a stolen semi-truck on I-95. Driver appears to be... a honey badger in a tilted trilby hat. He's maintaining PERFECT lane discipline while going 90 mph. Keeps muttering 'ten and two, baby' into his radio. This is a high-speed chase but weirdly safe?"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Stop the truck without causing a highway pileup
  • Figure out what's in the cargo—probably honey
  • Slick won't fight unless you threaten the bees

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "I pulled over a modified street racer for a broken taillight and there's a HONEY BADGER behind the wheel. Trilby hat, licking his paws 'for grip.' Says he's 'driving for the bees.' I don't know what that means but he just peeled out."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Catch Slick before he disappears into the city
  • Find out what 'driving for the bees' means
  • He's fast—you'll need speed or strategy

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "A semi-truck just backed through our loading dock wall! The driver—some kind of badger in a hat—is loading our entire honey shipment. Security camera caught him licking his paws and saying 'for grip' before each lift. We're losing thousands!"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Stop Slick from loading the truck
  • Be careful—he's stronger than he looks
  • The semi is his escape vehicle—disable it?

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "Officer down! The honey badger attacked three officers who got between him and a honey shipment. He kept saying 'I don't have a choice' and 'the bees need this.' He's desperate—and desperate honey badgers are DANGEROUS."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Subdue Slick—he's cornered and violent
  • Get the injured officers to safety
  • Find out why he's so desperate—what do the bees want?

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "You want to stop the honey badger? Then understand WHY he steals. He owes a debt to the bees—a life debt. The Beeves saved him once, and now he drives for them. Forever. Unless you can find another way to free him."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Investigate Slick's past—what happened?
  • Find the Beeves and negotiate his freedom
  • Is there another way to pay the debt?

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "Our security system just went down—someone hacked it from inside the building! Cameras caught a black bear in a beanie typing really fast and then saying 'I'm in' out loud. To no one. The vault doors are opening!"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Stop the bears entering through disabled security
  • Find acid_burn and shut down the hack
  • He's a hacker, not a fighter—corner him

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "Our servers were breached last night. The only evidence is a black beanie with bear fur on it and a sticky note that says 'thx 4 the data lol.' We need to know what was stolen before it goes public."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Analyze what data was stolen
  • Track acid_burn's digital footprint
  • What are the bears planning to do with this data?

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "We've traced a crypto pump-and-dump scheme to an entity called 'BEAR_COIN_2024.' The wallet is funding the bear crime spree. We need someone to trace the blockchain back to the source. The hacker uses the handle 'acid_burn.'"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Follow the crypto trail to acid_burn
  • Shut down the bear funding operation
  • This is white-collar crime—think smart, not strong

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "Dude, someone hacked my Instagram and posted that I wet the bed until I was 12! The trail leads to something called 'acid_burn.' I NEED you to find this bear and make him DELETE THAT POST. My social life is OVER."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Track acid_burn through cyberspace
  • Make him undo the damage to your friend's reputation
  • Why is a bear hacker targeting random teens?

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "They're ALL here! A grizzly giving orders, a panda monologuing at cameras, a five-limbed thing on the ceiling, something tiny filling water containers, a badger backing up a semi, and a bear on a laptop! Our ENTIRE honey reserve is being stolen!"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Face the full bear crew—all six at once
  • Each bear has different tactics—divide and conquer?
  • Stop them before they escape with 10,000 gallons of honey

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "I know where the bears hide. There's an abandoned subway station under the old cannery—they've turned it into a base. Glitter on the walls, bamboo containers everywhere, industrial water tanks, a garage for the semi. End this."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Locate and infiltrate the bear crew's secret HQ
  • Plan your approach—stealth or assault?
  • This could end the bear crime wave for good
